describe.zh_CN: 在魔化箱中，元素可以被去特征化，从而得到魔力，使用能量高的元素，往往可以转化到更多的魔力。\n在这个简陋的设备要启动转化这个过程，是需要消耗一定魔力的。\n特别注意的，正如先人留下来的记录，一旦元素去特征化得到魔力后，再后悔也是没有用的。
describe.en_US: In the Magiclization Box, Elements can be de-featurerized to the Magic. Using Element with high Power can often transform into more Magic.\nTo initiate the transformation process in this device, a certain amount of Magic is required.\n It is important to note that, as recorded by our ancestors, once the elements are de-featurerized to obtain Magic, it's useless to regret.
